title: Moving to Turkey for a holiday (Have posted a ticket but yet to recieve a response)
body: Hi, i am travelling to turkey and wanting to transfer my account to TR Region, i noticed once i transfer to TR, im not able to come back. Am i able to come back to OCE when im back from my holiday if i buy 2 transfers, one to EUW or NA and then back to OCE? Or will that not work?

replies.body:
OCE Transfers are not in a great place. Especially this time of year they are down more than they are up. It's not that you can't transfer back, but more that you might be waiting a lot longer to than you intended.

Your best bet will be player support once they get back to you.
